directions: Toss peaches, lemon zest, amaretto, honey, salt, red pepper flakes, and 1 cup hot water in slow cooker. Cover and cook on high until peaches are tender when pierced with a fork, about 1 hour. Keep warm until ready to serve.
Serve peaches and sauce over ice cream and top with basil.
ingredients: 1/2 cup basil leaves, torn if large
title: Slow Cooker Amaretto-Poached Peaches
